Package services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
services.UserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserService
public class UserService extends Object implements IUserService
Service class for managing user data and providing user-related functionality. Implements the IUserService interface for user management operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserService()
    Constructs a UserService object and loads user data from the "data/User.csv" file.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserService

      public UserService()
      Constructs a UserService object and loads user data from the "data/User.csv" file.

  • Method Details

    • saveToCSV

      public void saveToCSV()
      Saves the current list of users to the "data/User.csv" file. Includes a header row and writes each user's details.

    • login

      public boolean login(String hospitalID, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the provided hospital ID and password.
      Specified by:
      login in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Returns:
      True if authentication is successful, false otherwise.

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String hospitalID, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the password of the user identified by the hospital ID.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the user.
      oldPassword - The old password of the user.
      newPassword - The new password to set for the user.
      Returns:
      True if the password change is successful, false otherwise.

    • getUserRole

      public UserRole getUserRole(String hospitalID)
      Retrieves the role of the user identified by the hospital ID.
      Specified by:
      getUserRole in interface IUserService
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The UserRole of the user, or null if not found.

    • getUserById

      public User getUserById(String hospitalID)
      Retrieves a User object by its hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The User object, or null if not found.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(User user)
      Updates the information of a user in the users map.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing updated information.
      Returns:
      True if the update is successful, false otherwise.

    • addUser

      public void addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the system and saves the updated list to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      user - the User object to be added.

    • removeUser

      public boolean removeUser(String hospitalID)
      Removes a user from the system by their hospital ID and saves the updated list to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - the unique identifier of the user to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully removed, false otherwise.
